messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Oprah (OT)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/03 8:17:40 PM, shera70@wideopenwest.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/03 8:17:40 PM, shera70@... writes:

<< she went online and got them right away, so you may want to check that
out. >>

Actually, they only do last minute tix online, I guess to take the place of
the people who can't make it. (It'd work out fine for those who live close!)
Thanks though! Lara........

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Oprah (OT)
messages.msgSnippet: I ve watched Oprah for a total of about 5 minutes in the last year, but in that 5 min was a little old lady that said she had been trying forever to get
messages.messageBody:
I've watched Oprah for a total of about 5 minutes in the last year, but in that 5 min was a little old lady that said she had been trying forever to get tickets over the phone and was never able to, but then she went online and got them right away, so you may want to check that out.

Sheila Terry
shera70@...
